title: sshrun broken on crippled FS

labels.name: crippled-filesystems
labels.description: Issue concerned with operation on crippled filesystems, regardless of OS

body:
Happened with gh-4708 running on an exFAT SSD.

Both issues are related to the placement of the sockets on the crippled FS (which cannot have sockets). Related issues: #4198 #4075 #2696
```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.support.tests.test_sshrun.test_fancy_quotes
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mih/env/datalad3-dev/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 187, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 262, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 715, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/support/tests/test_sshrun.py", line 63, in test_fancy_quotes
    out, err = Runner().run(cmd)
  File "/home/mih/hacking/datalad/git/datalad/cmd.py", line 957, in run
    raise exc
datalad.support.exceptions.CommandError: CommandError: 'datalad sshrun localhost ''"'"'cat '"'"'"'"'"'"'"'"'/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_test_fancy_quotespock5f_b1 space'"'"'"'"'"'"'"'"''"'"''' failed with exitcode 255 [err: 'unix_listener: cannot bind to path /media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_r9hp3lge/.cache/datalad/sockets/6258b3a7.JFMGsYXY2IRpvj9D: Input/output error
ConnectionOpenFailedError: ''['"'"'ssh'"'"', '"'"'-fN'"'"', '"'"'-o'"'"', '"'"'ControlMaster=auto'"'"', '"'"'-o'"'"', '"'"'ControlPersist=15m'"'"', '"'"'-o'"'"', '"'"'ControlPath=/media/mih/Samsung_T5/tmp/datalad_temp_r9hp3lge/.cache/datalad/sockets/6258b3a7'"'"', '"'"'localhost'"'"']'' failed with exitcode 255 [Failed to open SSH connection (could not start ControlMaster process)]']
```
